LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeOrganicCombBulk.label: bulk extract from organic comb
LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeOrganicCombBulk.description: Centrifuges an organic comb to bulk extract honey, wax and template genomes
LanguageData.RB_CentrifugeOrganicCombBulk.jobString: Extracting honey, wax and template genomes
